original_text: Make one cherub on the one end, and one cherub on the other end. Of one piece with the mercy seat shall you make the cherubim on its two ends.
korean_text: 한 그룹은 이 끝에, 또 한 그룹은 저 끝에 곧 속죄소 두 끝에 속죄소와 한 덩이로 연결할지며

sentences.original_text: Make one cherub on the one end
and one cherub on the other end.
Of one piece with the mercy seat
shall you make the cherubim on its two ends.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 양 끝에 그룹들을 만들지니라
